description.ko: 보이지 않는 음파가 액체 빛과 기하학으로 이루어진 물리적이고 진동하는 조각으로 변모합니다.
description.en: Invisible sound waves transformed into a physical, vibrating sculpture of liquid light and geometry.

prompt: A sphere of liquid sapphire #4169E1 suspended in a silent void, reacting to a powerful #FFD700 golden resonance. The liquid erupts into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples, forming a complex 3D cymatic mandala. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #32CD32 intersect the form, visualizing soundwaves through physical weight. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing, high-speed motion blur on the edges, capturing the visual consonance of sound.
